system.description: Effect: Sharp spikes are scattered in the [Blast] area. A creature that starts an Activation in a space contraining Spikes takes a Tick of HP damage. A creature that moves through a space containing Spikes takes a Tick of HP damage for every meter they travel. If a creature moves at least 3m through the hazard, they lose another 4 Tick of HP.
